dct_title_s: Topographia aug. Turon[ensis] ducatus et confinium Galliae celticae sinu complectitur cuius latitudo ab aequinoctiali versus arcticum
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Scalla leucarum"; 5 units [= 7.8 cm].
Index: Les isles de la Riuierede Lovre.
Decorative cartouches containing title, dedication, address.
Monogram, bottom left: G[abriel] T[avernier] fe.[cit].
Appears in Bouguereau's Le theatre Francoys, 1594.
dct_publisher_sm: impensis Mauricy Boguerealdi cum privilegio Regis
